trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IPersistFile?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile` and `IPersist` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
Retrieves the class identifier (CLSID) of an object.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersist::GetClassID` in the MSDN library.
On successful return, a reference to the CLSID.
Retrieves either the absolute path to current working file of the object, or if there is no current working file, the default filename prompt of the object.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::GetCurFile` in the MSDN library.
The address of a pointer to a zero-terminated string containing the path for the current file, or the default filename prompt (such as *.txt).
Checks an object for changes since it was last saved to its current file.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::IsDirty` in the MSDN library.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_S_OK" name="S_OK" href=""></xref> if the file has changed since it was last saved; <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_FALSE" name="S_FALSE" href=""></xref> if the file has not changed since it was last saved.
Opens the specified file and initializes an object from the file contents.
The `STGM` enumeration is not part of the .NET Framework, but is documented in the MSDN library.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Load` in the MSDN library.
A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to open.
A combination of values from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_STGM" name="STGM" href=""></xref> enumeration to indicate the access mode in which to open `pszFileName`.
Saves a copy of the object into the specified file.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Save` in the MSDN library.
A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to which the object is saved.
Indicates whether `pszFileName` is to be used as the current working file.
Notifies the object that it can write to its file.
For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::SaveCompleted` in the MSDN library.
The absolute path of the file where the object was previously saved.
